title: The New HMPL No.15 Handlebar Bag
content:
HMPL just announced a pre-order for it its new No.15 Handlebar Bag, an homage to the first bag the Canadian maker ever made. Let’s check out the No.15 in Wide and Slim below.

HMPL launched a pre-order today, Wednesday, Feb 21, that will run for two weeks! Pricing will be $275 CAD for the SLIM version and $300 CAD for the WIDE version.

This rolltop handlebar/ saddle bag is the smaller version of our No24. Designed as the perfect day-to-day bag or overnighter light packing bag! Its roll-top design lets you use it casually like a basket or pack full of everything you need for a trip.

The No.15 is available in the WIDE version and SLIM version. The wide features BIG cinch top side pockets that can fit an insane amount of stuff – the Slim version has flat pockets made from a super stretchy Power-Mesh. You choose which suits your needs or bike fit best.

People with small bikes rejoice!! We designed this bag with YOU in mind – The No.15 Slim will fit down to a 36cm wide handlebar and only requires 4″ of clearance between the handlebar and tire!

Specs:

  • Roll Top Access Main Compartment
  • Snap closure on the roll-top
  • Main Flap Closure w/ built in overextension straps for extra big loads
  • Dual Layer Universal Molle Attachment System – Two different mounting heights
  • Built in Off-bike Carry Handle
  • Compatible with the HMPL Shoulder Strap
  • No.15 Wide ft. Cinch top pockets
  • No.15 Slim ft. Flat Power-Mesh Pockets
  • Designed to allow for usage of stabilizing dowel
  • Mounts to both handlebars and saddle
  • Removable structural plastic sheet
  • 2 Velcro Attachment Straps
  • 1 Shock Cord Headtube Strap
  • Handmade in Canada

 

Wide Sizing

  • Main Compartment Width: 11.5″
  • Overall Width including pockets: 18″
  • Depth: 7″
  • Closed height: 8″
  • Fully Open Height: 15″
  • Lowest Mount Point to Bottom of Bag : 4″
  • Volume: 11 – 18 Litres

 

Slim Sizing

  • Width: 11.5″
  • Depth: 7″
  • Closed height: 8″
  • Fully Open Height: 15″
  • Lowest Mount Point to Bottom of Bag : 4″
  • Volume: 11 – 18 Litres

 

See more at HMPL.
